entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Marshalling strings to unmanaged memory should provide a buffer length #81193
  • Consider fixing the "what dotnet process is this" problem #81191
  • [JIT] Possible optimization for `x % {pow2_cns}` transformation for `ulong` types #81189
  • createdump not running on segfault #81184
    8.0.0
  • Improve ConfigurationBinder performance with existing collections #81183
    Future
  • [.NET6 fix port] AccessViolationException with PublishSingleFile #81181
  • ILVerify fails to verify code that passes Nullable<T> to parameter with unmanaged constraint #81177
  • Consider adding IEqualityOperators<string, string, bool> to System.String #81173
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable symbolicating traces in Release builds #81172
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests` timing out on CI/linux #81170
    8.0.0
  • Include type names in InvalidCastException #81168
  • Missing mscordbi.dll 4.0.30319.0 from symbol servers #81167
  • Enabling a CPU profiler on Windows automatically enables ETW tracing and slows the app down by over 100x #81165
  • Redundant bound check "(uint)c > 'f' ? 0xFF : CharToHexLookup[c]" #81160
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesn't produce IL2109 - RUC on base type #81158
  • NativeAOT analysis - enable generation of warnings 2110, 2111, 2113 and 2115 #81156
  • GC crash in background_mark_simple1() #81154
  • SIGSEGV at `MethodTable::GetFlag` #81153
  • [API Proposal]: PriorityQueue<TElement, TPriority>.Peek(out TPriority) #81152
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] ordering issue around ensuring static constructor execution #81151
  • ExecutionEngineException while debugging unit test #81148
  • [Tracking] CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute #81145
    8.0.0
  • Verify `TarWriter.TarEntry(fileName, entryName)` behavior if user owner and device numbers cannot be retrieved #81144
    8.0.0
  • Platform Specifications Should Match Casing Among All Build Scripts #81141
    8.0.0
  • `System.Collections.Specialized.Tests` crash `remainder by zero` with AOT/chrome #81138
    8.0.0

Closed

  • ILC error when using a function pointer type nested under a generic type #81117
  • [linux-musl-arm] paltest_pal_sxs_test1 failed in outerloop #81113
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Text.Ascii:ChangeCase' when JitDumping #81087
    8.0.0
  • Developers should have a more consistent experience when using System.Text.Json #63918
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json converter infrastructure improvements for .NET 8 #77018
    8.0.0
  • CLRRuntimeHost.GetCurrentAppDomainId fails #6802
    Future
  • TcpListener.LocalEndPoint property should really be IPEndPoint, not EndPoint #63117
    Future
  • VS2017 does not work with CMake files, EventPipe directory config is broken #12426
    Future
  • Incomplete writes on Unix #48479
    Future
  • NativeAOT and ILLink should fetch PDBs for inputs #81140
    8.0.0
  • NativeAot produces warning for generic instantiation which can't be suppressed #77455
  • Extra ILC warnings when PublishAOT=true on method already marked RequiresUnreferencedCode #75898
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ReadOnlySequence overload for WriteRawValue #68223
    8.0.0
  • Regression with JsonConverter attribute with Syste.Text.Json 7 #80914
    7.0.x
  • Kestrel process creating multiple threads. #81149
  • dotnet-dump in container doesn't work due to ptrace restriction #80898
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort make methods virtual to allow overrides #77255
    Future
  • Dataflow crash while generating a warning about an assembly-level attribute #79833
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json unable to deserialize an object that implement IEnumerable but is itself not a list #81084
    Future
  • JIT: Improper handling of GC structs with undone promotion in tailcall-to-loop optimization #81081
    8.0.0
  • Q: Type 'IconBufferEventArgs' has a ComVisible(false) parent 'System.EventArgs' in its hierarchy, therefore QueryInterface calls for IDispatch or class interfaces are disallowed #80422
  • Erroneous `IOException` in `TarWriter.WriteEntry` on MacOS #81047
    8.0.0
  • Strange behavior when type matching on arrays of enums #81102

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: consolidate inlining code in fgInline.cpp #81198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft : Updating JitInterface to support Vector512. #81197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: build pred lists before patchpoint expansion #81196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable the /JIT/opt/ObjectStackAllocation/ObjectStackAllocationTests #81195
    area-Meta
  • Fix a variety of issues in FrozenCollections #81194
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix max chunk size limiting #81192
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Change Source link version number refs to new properties #81190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix GC interfaces versioning #81188
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • Add Lerp to IFloatingPointIeee754 #81186
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] no posix socks emulation #81182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid saving the result of OP_AOTCONST into the gc pin a… #81179
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Glossary: Change source for SoS to Wayback Machine link #81178
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix x86 clrgc loading #81176
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Debugging a racy test failing on CI #81166
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve -static-pie support #81163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    area-System.Net
  • Optimize `HexConverter.FromChar` #81146
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Remove duplicate 'cmp' instruction in specific comparison scenario #81143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize compare to `HexConverter.FromChar` result #81142
    community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81139
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x

Merged

  • avoid allocation of SelectClientCertificate delegate #81096
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Build mono logging profiler on s390x #72049
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Change banana build to Release #81127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Beef up `WithoutFunctionPointerType` #81147
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix PAL exception SXS test #81169
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add missing case for upper save/restore #81091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable ExceptionTests due to issue #81170, to get CI green #81171
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow forced building of mobile manifest pkgs, outside mobile builds #80920
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #80956
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure converter factories do not throw on unsupported types. #81133
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix tailcall-to-loop improper locals zeroing #81083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable ApiCompat ref<->src assembly validation #81104
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Enable Vector4.Dot #81130
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify getting full names for type loader purposes #81069
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid GetConstructors in constraint validation #81068
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter jit calls #81071
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81070
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Move mono llvm fullaot runtime test leg to rolling build #81125
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Fix S.N.Vector4 related assert #81126
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Fix type check for PackedSimd.Splat #81100
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][aot] Emit only virtual methods of instances when a class insta… #80267
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Introduce insGroup/instrDesc backwards navigation #80840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • BrowserDebugProxy: unify debug metadata reading for PE and Webcil #81099
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Switch tailcall implicit byref optimization to use last use information #81033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - X64 - Peephole optimization to possibly skip emitting `and reg, -1` #80468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use runtime ILLink.Tasks package instead of dotnet/linker #80764
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix use-after-free in EventPipe #81135
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • WIP: [wasm] Wasi build improvements #81052
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Fix analyzer support in templates #81077
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81050
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update the JIT to track `Span.Length` and `ReadOnlySpan.Length` as "never negative" #81055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build issues #81074
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Encode calling convention in mangled function pointer representation #81122
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Always allocate when computing temp path #81085
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][browser] improve default initial memory size #80849
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use IndexOf in StringBuilder.Replace(string, string, ...) #81098
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] CoreCLR initialization failures logging #81134
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • [release/7.0] Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #81101
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Metadata

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge PR 67238 - JIT: Refactor call argument representation #2177

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new list ... - searchs project template tags #30127
  • Allow installing .NET patch versions side by side #30113

Closed

  • Resolve issues with testing 8.0 templates in SDK repo #30033

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2097069 #30128
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DO NOT MERGE] add workaround for fixing floating tests #30117
  • Add test to verify mapping from analysis properties to analyzer config file #30115

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30061
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Differentiate logging messages between CLI and MSBuild #30118
    Area-ApiCompat
  • update output path in WebProjectsTests #30048
    Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Skip package when resolving package dependencies if it appears multiple times #30105
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make error optional in ApiSymbolExtensions logger #30102
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Prevent editors from auto-trimming trailing whitespaces in test approval files #30044
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Use Runtime ILLink package on SDK #29983
    Area-ILLink, DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Pattern matching on method params #6913

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Update README.md #6920
  • Publish notes for roles WG 2023-01-25 #6919

Merged

  • Update using-alias-types.md #6883
  • Publish roles WG notes for 2023-01-23 #6905

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor "Remove parameter" mistakenly removes arguments with '@' #66547
    17.6
  • No `Protected` keyword completion after `Private` in VB #66544
    17.6
  • Enums & generic math #66542
  • Missing completion for raw string after typing `$$"""` #66538
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0060 shouldn't warn for throw-only methods #65275

PullRequests

Created

  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
  • Add an API for the parsed command line back from an OptionsProcessor #66546
    Area-IDE
  • Correctly emit accessibility when generating properties via `SyntaxGenerator` #66543
    Area-IDE, Community
  • LocalRewriter.DecisionDagRewriter - Remove redundant field #66539
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Optimizer.StackOptimizerPass1 - Remove redundant field initializer #66540
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66534
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Prefer list-pattern for length-only counterexamples #66541
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Unused parameter analyzer shouldn't warn for methods that only throw #66535
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Support emitting type-parameter variance in syntax generator #66446
    Area-IDE
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Add serializer for bool?, enum, and enum? options #66526
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for brace pair highlighting for C# and VB (F#/TS can add support as well if desired). #66348
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE
  • Promote regular item to "Preferred" state #66278
    Area-IDE
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Make SymbolDisplay show nullable enum values as enums #66528
    Area-Compilers
  • Block instrumentation improvements #66506
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EPIC] `dotnet user-jwts` in .NET 8 #46263
  • ArgumentException in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzers.RouteHandlers.RouteHandlerAnalyzer #46261
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM: Assertion error and uncaught promise in AuthorizationService.ts #46257
  • Google authentication not working #46256
  • Allow abbreviated namespaces in components #46254

Closed

  • Upgraded to net6.0 recently and noticing references of packages like Microsoft.VisualBasic in the using statements #46175
  • Reduce build warnings to zero in 3.1 #31461
    3.1.x
  • Azure B2C logout endpoint does not redirect to the post_logout_redirect_uri when logout performed in YARP middleware #46104
  • Update TFM to net8.0 #45492
    8.0-preview1
  • Simplify 2.1 build #45506
    2.1.39
  • Unskip Source Build job #46191
    8.0-preview2
  • Unable to Build from Source #46219
  • MacOS/BlazorServer/HTTPS/.NET7.0: Protocol unsupported, no secure connection, ERR_SSL_VERSION_OR_CIPHER_MISMATCH after changes #46146
  • RegexRouteConstraint should use Compiled Regex #46154
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor Custom elements not working with .net 7 Blazor Server #46091
    Discussions
  • Unable to debug Blazor from Vscode #46222
  • Configure parameter binding #43386
    Discussions
  • HttpContext property of HttpContextAccessor is null in the ClientCertificateValidation callback of HttpsConnectionAdapterOptions #46052
  • Blazor .NET 7 CustomElements two-way binding/calls not working #46111
  • DictionaryModelBinder not working with null default value in .Net 7 #45502
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding ILLink.Substituions.xml EmbeddedResource #46265
    area-runtime
  • Install VS Community by default #46262
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Multiple accept loops in named pipes transport #46259
    area-runtime
  • Change IsTfaEnabled to IsTwoFactorEnabledAsync #46258
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Make it easy to produce a 2.1 build without prodcon #46197
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • Add RegexOptions.Compiled option to RegexRouteConstraint #46192
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Convert UTF16 to UTF 8 #46245
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Prevent merging PRs which have CI checks run a week+ ago #46177
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [Named Pipe] Check for pipe broken on WaitConnectionAsync #46230
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime
  • Improve IIS error when wrong application path #46249
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, .NET 8 Planning
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove premature QuicListener.IsSupported check #44755
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update SauceLabs Connection version #45242
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update OIDC sample #45349
    area-security, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • SIGSEGV at MethodTable::GetFlag #3613
  • dotnet-counters in Azure Kudu/Console. #2323
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix/disable nullable warnings treated as errors with newer SDKs installed #3616
  • Remove duplicate SOS command docs #3612
  • Updated version of TraceEvent to 3.7 in order to add escaped characters to Chromium files #3611

Merged

  • [SDM] Changes To MetricType #3615
  • Convert Histogram to single payload #3614
  • Dev/mirogers/kudu console #3083
    dotnet-trace, dotnet-counters, dotnet-dump, dotnet-stack

Updated

  • Add .NET 8.0 testing #3602
  • Add support for System.Diagnostics.Metrics in dotnet-monitor's collector #3587

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS, MacCatalyst] CarouselView sizing issue when nested in StackLayout #12911
  • Nested FlexLayout/BindableLayout Very Slow #12908
  • Add UI Test for WebView HTML5 video player #12907
    Backlog
  • Android - Setting TabPage Tab color causes System.NullRefException #12904
    Backlog
  • GraphicsView not shown / issue with IsVisible property #12903
  • BlazorHybrid does not scale to system font size on iOS #12902
  • Illegal Clip value did not throw exceptions at compile time and DEBUG mode #12900
    Backlog
  • DatePicker Focused, UnFocused not working as expected #12899
    Backlog
  • Data binding not working if bound model is updated from different source to bound viewpage #12898
    Backlog
  • WebView Cookies not working #12896
    Backlog
  • iOS label within horizontalstacklayout overflowing container #12895
    Backlog

Closed

  • [iOS] Image in StackLayout in Shell.FlyoutHeader is not visible #12892
    Backlog
  • Frame does not programmatically clear content consistently #12628
    Backlog
  • CollectionView ItemSpacing cannot be set below an arbitrary value #4520
    Backlog
  • CollectionView has default spacing between items on Windows which I cannot remove #12495
    Backlog
  • Java Lang Null Exception when adding Map Pins via Binding #12617
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Pre-compute Grid star values when possible #12912
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Prevent mobile and lib templates from opening editors if in VS #12905
    area/templates 📄
  • Fix EvaluateJavaScriptAsync using Compatibility WebView Renderer #12901
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Tizen] refactor splash updater #12897
    community ✨, partner/tizen

Merged

  • Use the CommunityToolkit.Mvvm messenger instead of MessagingCenter in the samples #12885
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow to dynamically add/remove the Frame content #12634
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Windows] Fix default item min height in CollectionView #12811
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Update HOWTOBUILD for MAUI #12869
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12839
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12766
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update Essentials Text-To-Speech API Docs #12851
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #12754
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix Modal page offset measuring for AdjustPan and AdjustResize #12661
    area/modal
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12872
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8 #12803
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.8 to 1.2.1.9 #12848
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.3 to 1.4.0.4 #12847
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.7.0.1 to 1.7.0.2 #12836
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.1 to 2.5.1.2 #12842
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721

  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: consider pruning orderby from subquery projection if we don't end up using it on the outside #30143
  • Migration fails in EF7 when mapping TVF using a model with 'string' properties #30142
  • Support some form of dependency injection to parameterize a `Migration` #30141
  • EF Core 7 now warns about missing ValueComparer despite it being set #30139
  • Include() ignored when using GroupBy entity type #30138
  • Replace multi-level relationship in Entity Framework Core 6 vs 7 #30135

Closed

  • every time use Add migration, ef wants to update all seeded data #30116
  • Entity Framework 7 Many-To-Many (intersect table) "skip navigation" problem #30125
  • Update to Microsoft.Data.SqlClient 5.1.0 #30105
    8.0.0
  • Modifying the model outside of OnModelCreating #30108
  • EF7 - IsLoaded property is always false on navigation-properties when using AsNoTracking() #30140
  • Massive performance decrease on Migrate #30077
  • Reset bulk-configuration for a specific property. #30136
  • JSON query regression in EF8 #30073
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29667 - Count after Take throws "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'." #30144
    Servicing-consider
  • Document that HasMaxLength(-1) means no maximum length #30137
  • Fix to #29667 - Count after Take throws "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'." #30134

Merged

  • [SMALL] Fix to #30073 - JSON query regression in EF8 #30086

Updated

  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optional workloads do not work in .NET 8 builds #15348

PullRequests

Created

  • Align Sdk and installer target frameworks and delete unused task #15351
  • Poison work - reordering and exclusion of non-shipping packages #15347
  • add tests for covering adding item templates (C# and VB) #15343
  • tests: ExecuteRunWeb: update expected SIGTERM exit code on mono. #15341

Merged

  • Enable package version props flow for roslyn-analyzers #15350
  • Update license #15340
  • Include RID in SB artifact file names #15320
  • Enable the loc build for installer #15334
